backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and menu items with admin/user authorization and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping responsive UI requirements to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries for multiple frontend files describing their purpose and responsive behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables and global styles defining color tokens, dark mode values, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting SEO metadata, social preview tags, favicon, and root mount.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router, React Query, and the global layout with header, footer, and pages.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Brand logo component with size variants and fallback text mark when the logo image fails.
frontend/src/components/GalleryImage.tsx: File present but contains no implementation in provided excerpt.
frontend/src/components/GlobalSearch/Glo: Implements a debounced global search input with dropdown results and navigation handlers. Manages open state, keyboard interactions, and clicking outside to close.
frontend/src/components/LogoMotif.tsx: Displays a semi-transparent logo image with fallback to text on load error. Supports three size presets and custom classes.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuCategor: Displays a menu category icon from a sprite sheet based on icon key, with fallback UI if missing. Uses background positioning to show the correct sprite.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Wrapper component providing consistent vertical padding and container layout. Accepts custom styling for section and inner container.
frontend/src/components/Seo.tsx: Updates document title and meta tags for description and Open Graph fields on mount. Dynamically adds missing tags if needed.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, quick links, contact details, and social buttons. Uses responsive grid layout and shared UI components.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides the sticky site header with branding, navigation, global search, and social links. Supports admin-only menu items and mobile menu toggling.
frontend/src/components/SocialConnect.ts: Displays Instagram and Google Review links in default or compact form. Wraps links in styled buttons for clear calls-to-action.
frontend/src/components/WatermarkBackgro: Renders fixed-position multi-layer watermark backgrounds with low opacity for decorative effect. Uses three repeating image layers.
frontend/src/data/menuData.ts: Defines menu category and item interfaces and exports a full list of predefined menu categories with descriptions, images, and items.
frontend/src/data/offersData.ts: Defines the Offer interface and exports a list of static promotional offers for display and search.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a hook that returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalSearch.ts: Implements global search across pages, offers, menu categories, and menu items using backend data and merged menu metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, stored identities, and provides an authentication context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, menu retrieval, and menu updates using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global styles, color variables, dark mode themes, and Tailwind layers for consistent UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts: Exports a centralized object containing paths to core brand image assets like logo, favicon, and hero image.
frontend/src/lib/menuAdapters.ts: Provides functions to convert menu data between frontend and backend formats and merge backend data with defaults.
frontend/src/lib/socialConnectLinks.ts: Exports centralized social media and review platform URLs with labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with restaurant story, values, and styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details, hours, location, and social links for the restaurant.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Empty or placeholder file for the gallery page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with hero section, cuisine highlights, and action buttons.
frontend/src/pages/MenuManagementPage.ts: Admin interface for editing menu categories and items with authentication and backend syncing.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Shows the full menu with categories, scrolling focus behavior, and backend data merging.
frontend/src/pages/OffersPage.tsx: Renders the Offers page with hero section, offer cards built from OFFERS data, and terms list. Includes icons, SEO setup, and responsive layout using Sections and UI components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and handling hash-based query parsing. Supports persisted URL parameters and safe clearing of stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended color system, typography, container settings, custom animations, shadows, and responsive design utilities. Enables plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s responsive-design goals, current features, and pending requests. Tracks schema, versions, issues, and device-compatibility requirements.
